data.title: Chris Sarandon Biography
data.meta_description: Chris Sarandon biography and related resources.
data.text:
Chris Sarandon (born July 24, 1942), is an American actor. He was married to the actress Susan Sarandon , who retained her married name after their divorce.

Movies

The Princess Bride - Prince Humperdinck

Dog Day Afternoon

The Centinnel
